events.title: Invasion of the Golden Plains
events.description: Invaders threaten the prosperity of Thalindor. Players must repel the attack.
events.impact: Trade routes are disrupted if the event fails.

events.title: Mystical Disturbance in Sylvaria
events.description: Magical forces disrupt the balance of the Foresta di Sylvarion. Players must restore harmony.
events.impact: Spirits become hostile if the event fails.
